activate.d.description: Whether the package contains activation scripts
activate.d.title: Activate.D

binary_prefix.description: Whether the package contains binary files that hardcode the installation prefix
binary_prefix.title: Binary Prefix

deactivate.d.description: Whether the package contains deactivation scripts
deactivate.d.title: Deactivate.D

dev_url.description: The URL to the development page of the package
dev_url.title: Dev Url

doc_url.description: The URL to the documentation page of the package
doc_url.title: Doc Url

has_post_link_scripts.description: Whether the package contains post-link scripts
has_post_link_scripts.title: Has Post Link Scripts

has_pre_link_scripts.description: Whether the package contains pre-link scripts
has_pre_link_scripts.title: Has Pre Link Scripts

has_pre_unlink_scripts.description: Whether the package contains pre-unlink scripts
has_pre_unlink_scripts.title: Has Pre Unlink Scripts

home.description: The URL to the homepage of the package
home.title: Home

run_exports.description: The run exports of the package, per package version (not build!)
run_exports.title: Run Exports

source_url.description: The URL to the latest source code of the package
source_url.title: Source Url

subdirs.description: Which subdirs the package is available in
subdirs.title: Subdirs

summary.description: The summary of the package. Shorter than description.
summary.title: Summary

text_prefix.description: Whether the package contains text files that hardcode the installation prefix
text_prefix.title: Text Prefix

timestamp.description: Last update time for artifacts of this package
timestamp.title: Timestamp

version.description: The latest version of the package
version.title: Version

strong.description:
Dependencies to be exported to runtime requirements when package is added as a build
dependency.
strong.title: Strong

strong_constrains.description:
Dependencies to be exported to runtime constrains when package is added as a build
dependency.
strong_constrains.title: Strong Constrains

weak.description:
Dependencies to be exported to runtime requirements when package is added as a host
dependency.
weak.title: Weak

weak_constrains.description:
Dependencies to be exported to runtime constrains when package is added as a host
dependency.
weak_constrains.title: Weak Constrains

description:
Data structures that are present in a `channeldata.json` file. Some channels on anaconda.org
contain a `channeldata.json` file which describes the subdirs the channel contains, the
packages stored in the channel and additional data about them like their latest version.

The `ChannelData` struct represents the data found within the `channeldata.json` file. The
`ChannelDataPackage` contains information about a package.

Note that certain aspects of `ChannelData` are broken (e.g. run_exports is only available for a
single package variant) and therefore the `ChannelData` struct is not really used much more.

channeldata_version.description: The version of the channeldata format
channeldata_version.title: Channeldata Version

packages.description: The packages available in the channel, grouped by name
packages.title: Packages

subdirs.description: The subdirs available in the channel
subdirs.title: Subdirs

title: ChannelData
